Text: Thank you so much fr this comment/the reality check!! The therapist I'm looking into specializes in DBT, so hopefully working w/that will help me find better coping skills. I rlly appreciate your comment & hope you're having a nice day!

Author: wishamfwould
Text: Don’t focus on fixing ur ED. Focus on fixing what makes you feel the need to cope. If u learn other ways to cope and have a therapist keep watch over your new coping habits hopefully you will feel better! Obviously recover if you want to! It’s honestly the best choice in this situation but at least you know there’s alternatives.
